actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of July 31, 1946, as amended, relating to the United States Capitol Grounds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of the United States Capitol Grounds specified areas and portions of streets surrounding the Capitol, the Botanic Garden, and the Capitol Power Plant. Revises the list of streets to be maintained and improved by the District of Columbia. Authorizes the Capitol Police Board to detail police for police duty on the Capitol Grounds and the Library of Congress Grounds. Authorizes the Architect of the Capitol to acquire specified property for addition to the Capitol Grounds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of July 31, 1946, as amended, relating to the United States Capitol Grounds, and for other purposes.
